name: Get Lucky
description:
It's the only slot machine that requires skill!

In Get Lucky, your job is to watch the slots carefully. Then give your iPhone/iPod a quick shake, and boom, collect your winnings! But be careful-- if you don't make a match, skulls will get added to your slot wheel. If you match skulls, you lose!

Includes special bonuses, great sound effects, and your own personal high score list. It's a great time-waster AND a great strategic challenge!
